abstract: President Lyndon B. Johnson attended the burial of Gus Grissom, the second American to fly in space, who was killed during an Apollo 1 prelaunch test.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — Crows sat high in the bare trees. Their cawing came down from the branches and across the frost-whitened grass to where the people were standing in silence at Plot 2503-e at Arlington Cemetery.
snippet: President Lyndon B. Johnson attended the burial of Gus Grissom, the second American to fly in space, who was killed during an Apollo 1 prelaunch test....
